question: What is the theme of 2017 World Red Cross Red Crescent Day (WRCRCD)?
option4: Get Together for the purpose of Humanity
explanation: The World Red Cross and Red Crescent Day is observed every year on May 8 to commemorate the birth anniversary Jean Henry Dunant, the founder of International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) and the recipient of the first Nobel Peace Prize. The 2017 theme is “Less Known Red Cross Stories”.
